homeSection.description: Passionate about creating exceptional mobile experiences with Flutter. I specialize in building scalable, performance-optimized applications that delight users and drive business growth.

aboutMeHeadline: I'm Mohamed Abdo Elnashar, a Senior Flutter Developer with 6+ years of experience, specializing in cross-platform mobile applications, and intern on Web3/blockchain solutions.
aboutMeDetails: Currently working as a Senior Flutter Developer at Dscale.io in Dubai, UAE, developing cutting-edge e-commerce (Ayshei) and fintech (XFI Send Money) applications.

experience.description: Developing 'Ayshei' e-commerce and auction platform with Flutter web vendor portal. Building 'XFI Send Money' fintech application for secure money transfers.
responsibilities: Collaborate on Flutter development for Ayshei and XFI Send Money applications
Implement complex UI/UX designs with animations
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products

experience.description: Developed Flutter Web-based Appointment Booking System integrated with Clinic Pro. Implemented Emirates ID reader integration using PapService. Built telemedicine features using Agora with AWS cloud storage.
responsibilities: Integrated Emirates ID reader for secure user identification
Implemented telemedicine features with video calling
Managed AWS cloud storage for user data and media

experience.description: Collaborated on Flutter development team for sports management platform. Developed web-based subscription management system with Stripe Gateway integration. Mentored junior developers and established best practices.
responsibilities: Collaborated on development of GoSports management platform
Implemented subscription management system with Stripe Gateway
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Established best practices for Flutter development

experience.description: Created comprehensive GoSports application for sports academy & club management. Implemented player management, financial systems, and real-time analytics using Firebase suite and SQLite.
responsibilities: Developed GoSports application for sports management
Implemented player management and financial tracking systems
Integrated Firebase for real-time data synchronization
Utilized SQLite for local data storage and offline capabilities
Implemented subscription management system with In-App Purchases
